atk-abh03a11:2_0: 279. Idāni jahatikathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṁ “jhānalābhī puthujjano saha saccābhisamayā
atk-abh03a11:2_1: anāgāmī nāma hoti, tassa puthujjanakāleyeva kāmarāgabyāpādā pahīnā”ti laddhi seyyathāpi
atk-abh03a11:2_2: etarahi sammitiyānaṁ, tesaṁ taṁ laddhiṁ bhindituṁ jahati puthujjanoti pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a11:2_3: jhānavikkhambhitānaṁ pana tesaṁ pariyuṭṭhānaṁ apassantassa paṭiññā paravādissa. Yasmā
atk-abh03a11:2_4: pana tesaṁ jhānavikkhambhitānampi anāgāmimaggeneva accantaṁ pahānaṁ hoti, tasmā puna
atk-abh03a11:2_5: accantantiādianuyogo sakavādissa, tathārūpassa pahānassa abhāvato paṭikkhepo itarassa.
atk-abh03a11:2_6: Vikkhambhetīti accantavikkhambhanameva sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa. Tato paraṁ anāgāmimaggaṭṭhena
atk-abh03a11:3: 280. Tato paraṁ anāgāmiphale saṇṭhātīti puṭṭho jhānānāgāmitaṁ sandhāya paṭijānāti. Arahatte saṇṭhātīti puṭṭho dassanamaggena uddhambhāgiyānaṁ pahānābhāvato paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a11:4_0: Apubbaṁ acarimaṁ tayo maggeti puṭṭho tathārūpāya bhāvanāya abhāvā paṭikkhipati. Puna
atk-abh03a11:4_1: puṭṭho tiṇṇaṁ maggānaṁ kiccasabbhāvaṁ sandhāya paṭijānāti. Sāmaññaphalapucchāsupi
atk-abh03a11:4_2: eseva nayo. Katamena maggenāti puṭṭho anāgāmimaggenāti jhānānāgāmitaṁ sandhāya vadati.
atk-abh03a11:4_3: Puna saṁyojanappahānaṁ puṭṭho tiṇṇaṁ anāgāmimaggena tesaṁ kilesānaṁ appaheyyattā
atk-abh03a11:4_4: paṭikkhipati. Dutiyaṁ puṭṭho paṭhamamaggasseva jhānānāgāmimaggabhāvaṁ sandhāya paṭijānāti.
